about.title: About
about.desc: It is an application that aims to gather as many advertisers as possible from many countries and provide them with a suitable environment and easy ways to communicate with each other and sell and display ads or buy others and also they can inquire about what they want and respond to those inquiries
about.step1Desc: User registers and creates their own account to be able to use the application and ads effectively and integrated.
about.step2Desc: User can browse available ads and also add new ads and display them to everyone in the application and can even add inquiries and customer comments.
about.step3Desc: Now user can communicate with other users whether to inquire about an ad and buy it or sell their own ad.

Conditions1: Welcome to the Monasba app. Please read the terms and conditions carefully before using the website or application.
Conditions2: Your browsing or adding any advertisement with us is considered an acknowledgment that you have read and agreed to the terms and conditions
Conditions3: Ashhen General Trading Company owns the application and website (Monasba), which is a platform that provides advertising space for its users (sellers and buyers)
Conditions4: The role of (application site) is limited to providing space for seller and buyer to meet easily and (application site) does not bear any responsibility.
Conditions5: The role of (application site) is limited to providing space for seller and buyer to meet easily (application site).
Conditions6: No responsibility or warranties are provided to users including the presence of new products and purchases.
Conditions7: And no compensation may be claimed for any damage.
Conditions9: Advertisements are listed after registration with mobile number and email, and the advertiser must classify the advertisement and publish it in the correct section, and the advertisement title, product description, price and images must be written correctly, and the product must be real and available.
Conditions10: The seller must be the owner of the services or service advertisements are commercial or on behalf of others. It is forbidden to publish advertisements for companies or stores. It contains a ban on publishing advertisements with words or images that violate public morals or are illegal, as well as any advertisement about a celebrity by individuals or organizations
Conditions11: It is prohibited to publish advertisements for the sale of weapons of all kinds, whether licensed or unlicensed, and each advertisement shall be for one commodity only. In the case of multiple commodities, a separate advertisement shall be made for each commodity. It is prohibited to publish lawyers' advertisements that aim to advertise the lawyer himself or work to attract clients.
Conditions12: It is prohibited to publish advertisements that violate the laws in the country of origin of the advertisement. It is also prohibited to publish advertisements that violate the laws in the State of Kuwait, especially No. 63 of 2015 regarding combating electronic laws, Law No. 38 of 2002 regarding the anatomy of the law of announcing material in health. It is prohibited to publish advertisements for medicines and sexual stimulants.
Conditions13: It is prohibited to publish all types of smoking advertisements, whether regular or electronic, and it is prohibited to sell endangered plants and animals listed in the CITES agreement, in accordance with the decisions and regulations of the Environment Public Authority. It is prohibited to publish advertisements for domestic workers of all kinds, as well as publishing advertisements for fake labor or renting labor for homes.
Conditions14: It is also prohibited to publish all types of human trafficking. It is forbidden to publish any advertisement for gambling and objections or advertisements for magic and sorcery. It is forbidden to publish advertisements for alcohol or spirits of all kinds - as well as prohibiting the publication of advertisements for drugs and hashish of all kinds
Conditions15: It is prohibited to display and sell eavesdropping devices and means of inciting the misuse of telephone devices, in accordance with Law No. 9 of 2001 regarding the misuse of telephone communications devices and eavesdropping devices.
Conditions16: It is prohibited to advertise loan repayment and disbursement, and it is prohibited to advertise investment and call for investment and commercial participation.
Conditions17: And because the management of (valid application) is valid to block any phone number used in abuse or harm to others or in case the application is used for illegal purposes, the user takes into account other browsers and users
Conditions18: It is forbidden to reserve advertisements or reserve installation for the purpose of selling them to another party.
Conditions19: It is forbidden to publish advertisements for the purpose of collecting donations or charitable work.
Conditions20: It is prohibited to publish advertisements for the purpose of collecting donations or charitable work, and it is prohibited to publish advertisements for the purpose of collecting donations or charitable work.
Conditions21: The publisher of the advertisement for providing craft work must have a license from the competent authorities to practice the activity, and application users are required to verify the existence of the necessary documents and licenses before contracting with craft work providers, without any responsibility on (the competent application).
Conditions22: In the absence of a license to practice the activity for the advertiser to provide craft services, the advertisement will be canceled and official employees will be provided with the seller's data when requested by the management of (the competent application), and the management has the right to prevent any user who does not comply with the application's conditions.
Conditions23: Users can also communicate with each other through chats (chats) and voice messages and they can also comment on advertisements and reply to comments
Conditions24: Users can report inappropriate content or inappropriate people, in addition to the ability to block inappropriate users and not see them or their ads or comments.
